aiplugin.name: msdynaib_AINL2Ratings
aiplugin.humandescription:
Given a generic review comment or feedback, classify and show ratings based on sentiment and other criteria.
Review Comment: "[ Comment ]"
Instructions: 1. The model will analyze the sentiment of the comment and provide a rating based on the sentiment. 2. Return Output the sentiment classification
